about.title: Tell It Like a Fairy Tale
about.eventDetails:
Age limit: 10 years and older
Date: Saturday, January 10
Time: 18:30
Venue: Martinlaakson Auditorio
about.concept: Concept: Music and Conversation / Solo stage performance
about.paragraph1: An intimate narrative where music and life intertwine…
about.paragraph2: In life, every emotion can transform into a song… Sometimes a memory that brings a smile, sometimes a heartfelt melancholy, and sometimes, both at once.
about.paragraph3: Artist Metin Haboğlu takes the audience on a journey that both entertains and moves with his new stage project "Tell It Like a Fairy Tale", where he combines music and storytelling.
about.paragraph4: In this special solo performance, Haboğlu brings to the stage real stories compiled from his own life and surroundings, blended with music.
about.paragraph5: At times, he makes you smile with songs highlighting the humorous side of an event, and at other times, he touches hearts with a sincere melody.
about.paragraph6: This approximately 100-minute performance is neither a classical concert nor an ordinary conversation…
about.paragraph7: "Tell It Like a Fairy Tale" is a stage experience that speaks in the language of music and flows with the rhythm of stories.
about.paragraph8: Metin Haboğlu narrates his stories on stage with "hope".
about.paragraph9: Fed not by pain, but by hope, humanity, and lived experiences, this performance offers the audience an intimate atmosphere where they can find traces of their own lives.
